downloadTitle: Microsoft Surface 1.0 Management Pack for Operations Manager 2007
downloadDescription: This management pack includes a set of rules, views, operations, and monitors to help you manage Microsoft Surface 1.0 units.
detailsSection:
This management pack includes a set of rules, views, operations, and monitors to help you manage Microsoft Surface 1.0 units. These resources can help you keep your organization's Microsoft Surface environment in a healthy state.

For specific information about Microsoft System Center Operations Manager 2007, see the Microsoft System Center Operations Manager Web site.
systemRequirementsSection:
• Windows Vista
  • Applicable Microsoft Surface Software Platforms:
    • Microsoft Surface Runtime 1.0
    • Microsoft Surface SDK 1.0
installInstructionSection:
1. On a Microsoft Surface unit, download the files.
  2. Follow the installation instructions in the included PDF file.
